title: Understanding Global Society through Remote Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital collaboration tool proficiency and foundational social studies concepts
context.additional_context: Conducted in environments where digital devices are provided, prioritizing learning experiences linked to workplace collaboration for professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can produce culturally adapted outcomes by completing at least three collaborative assignments with international partners over four weeks
Learners can improve social problem-solving solutions by providing and incorporating peer feedback through digital collaboration tools
Learners can specifically analyze learning achievements and areas for improvement in remote collaboration processes by maintaining weekly reflective journals
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
